description.zh-cn: 位于北美洲北部的国家，实行联邦制、君主立宪制及议会制，是英联邦和法语国家及地区国际组织的成员国。
description.en: A country in the northern part of North America, operating under a federal, constitutional monarchy, and parliamentary system. It is a member of the Commonwealth of Nations and the Organisation internationale de la Francophonie.

description.zh-cn: 现任加拿大君主，同时也是其他15个英联邦国家的君主。
description.en: The current monarch of Canada, who is also the monarch of 15 other Commonwealth realms.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大总督，代表加拿大君主行使权力。
description.en: The Governor General of Canada, who exercises the powers of the Canadian monarch.

description.zh-cn: 根据资料文本，其为加拿大总理。
description.en: According to the source text, the Prime Minister of Canada.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大首席大法官。
description.en: The Chief Justice of Canada.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大的联邦立法机构，由加拿大君主、上议院和下议院组成。
description.en: The federal legislature of Canada, consisting of the Canadian Monarch, the Senate, and the House of Commons.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大国会的上议院。
description.en: The upper house of the Parliament of Canada.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大国会的下议院。
description.en: The lower house of the Parliament of Canada.

description.zh-cn: 指加拿大省、新不伦瑞克省和新斯科舍省组成加拿大联邦的历史事件。
description.en: The historical event in which the Province of Canada, New Brunswick, and Nova Scotia united to form the Dominion of Canada.

description.zh-cn: 一项英国国会法令，通过该法令成立了加拿大联邦。
description.en: An act of the Parliament of the United Kingdom which established the Dominion of Canada.

description.zh-cn: 一项英国国会法令，肯定了加拿大的独立性，使其成为独立国家。
description.en: An Act of the Parliament of the United Kingdom that affirmed Canada's independence, establishing it as an independent nation.

description.zh-cn: 将加拿大宪法的修宪权从英国国会移交至加拿大国会的政治过程。
description.en: The political process that led to the transfer of the authority to amend the Constitution of Canada from the Parliament of the United Kingdom to the Parliament of Canada.

description.zh-cn: 英国国会通过的法律，将加拿大宪法修宪权移交加拿大国会。
description.en: An act passed by the UK Parliament that transferred the power to amend the Canadian Constitution to the Parliament of Canada.

description.zh-cn: 前加拿大女王，御准了《1982年加拿大法令》。
description.en: Former Queen of Canada who gave Royal Assent to the Canada Act 1982.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲国家，加拿大的前宗主国，两国至今在英联邦框架下保持密切关系。
description.en: A European country and the former colonial power of Canada. The two nations maintain close relations within the Commonwealth framework.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲国家，曾在加拿大建立殖民地，两国现为法语国家及地区国际组织成员。
description.en: A European country that established colonies in Canada. Both nations are now members of the Organisation internationale de la Francophonie.

description.zh-cn: 与加拿大拥有世界上最长不设防边界的国家，两国在军事和经济上有广泛合作。
description.en: A country that shares the world's longest undefended border with Canada. The two nations have extensive military and economic cooperation.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大省份，1867年加入联邦，是加拿大联邦的创始成员之一。
description.en: A Canadian province that joined the Confederation in 1867 as one of its founding members.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大省份，1867年加入联邦，是加拿大联邦的创始成员之一。
description.en: A Canadian province that joined the Confederation in 1867 as one of its founding members.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大省份，1867年加入联邦，是加拿大联邦的创始成员之一。
description.en: A Canadian province that joined the Confederation in 1867 as one of its founding members.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大省份，1867年加入联邦，是加拿大联邦的创始成员之一。
description.en: A Canadian province that joined the Confederation in 1867 as one of its founding members.

description.zh-cn: 法国在北美洲的殖民地，在七年战争后被割让给英国。
description.en: A French colony in North America, ceded to Great Britain after the Seven Years' War.

description.zh-cn: 一场全球性的军事冲突，其结果导致法国将其几乎所有的北美殖民地让予英国。
description.en: A global military conflict, the outcome of which resulted in France ceding almost all of its North American colonies to Great Britain.

description.zh-cn: 一场全球性战争，加拿大在总理威廉·莱昂·麦肯齐·金的领导下对德宣战，并参与了多场重要战役。
description.en: A global war in which Canada, under Prime Minister William Lyon Mackenzie King, declared war on Germany and participated in many important battles.

description.zh-cn: 1933年至1945年间由纳粹党统治的德国，是第二次世界大战中加拿大的敌对国。
description.en: Germany under the rule of the Nazi Party from 1933 to 1945, an adversary of Canada during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 一场始于2003年的军事冲突，加拿大拒绝了美国提出的加入此战争的邀请。
description.en: A military conflict that began in 2003. Canada declined the United States' invitation to join the war.

description.zh-cn: 一个欧洲和北美国家为实现防务合作而建立的国际组织，加拿大是其创始国之一。
description.en: An international organization established by European and North American countries for defense cooperation, of which Canada is a founding member.

description.zh-cn: 一个由主权国家组成的国际组织，致力于促进国际合作，加拿大是其创始国之一。
description.en: An international organization of sovereign states dedicated to promoting international cooperation, of which Canada is a founding member.

description.zh-cn: 由56个主权国家组成的国际组织，成员多为前英国殖民地，加拿大是其成员国。
description.en: An international organization of 56 sovereign states, most of which are former British colonies. Canada is a member state.

nodes.id: 法语国家及地区国际组织

zh-cn: 法语国家及地区国际组织

description.zh-cn: 以法语为第一或第二语言的国家和地区组成的国际组织，加拿大是其成员国。
description.en: An international organization of countries and regions where French is the first or second language. Canada is a member state.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大、美国和墨西哥于1994年签署的自由贸易协定，旨在消除三国之间的贸易壁垒。
description.en: A free trade agreement signed by Canada, the United States, and Mexico in 1994, aimed at eliminating trade barriers among the three countries.

description.zh-cn: 北美洲国家，与加拿大和美国共同签署了《北美自由贸易协议》。
description.en: A North American country that, along with Canada and the United States, signed the North American Free Trade Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 查尔斯三世是现任加拿大君主，为国家元首。
description.en: Charles III is the current Monarch of Canada, serving as the head of state.

description.zh-cn: 玛丽·西蒙被任命为加拿大总督，作为加拿大君主查尔斯三世的代表。
description.en: Mary Simon is appointed as the Governor General of Canada, representing the Canadian monarch, Charles III.

description.zh-cn: 根据资料文本，马克·卡尼是加拿大总理，向代表君主的总督负责。
description.en: According to the source text, Mark Carney is the Prime Minister of Canada, accountable to the Governor General who represents the monarch.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大上议院是加拿大国会的组成部分之一，是其上议院。
description.en: The Senate of Canada is a component of the Parliament of Canada, serving as its upper house.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大下议院是加拿大国会的组成部分之一，是其下议院。
description.en: The House of Commons of Canada is a component of the Parliament of Canada, serving as its lower house.

description.zh-cn: 《1867年宪法法令》的通过正式促成了加拿大联邦的建立。
description.en: The passage of the Constitution Act, 1867 formally brought about the establishment of the Canadian Confederation.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大联邦化事件标志着现代加拿大的诞生。
description.en: The event of Canadian Confederation marked the birth of modern Canada.

description.zh-cn: 安大略省是1867年组成加拿大联邦的四个创始省份之一。
description.en: Ontario was one of the four founding provinces that formed the Canadian Confederation in 1867.

description.zh-cn: 魁北克省是1867年组成加拿大联邦的四个创始省份之一。
description.en: Quebec was one of the four founding provinces that formed the Canadian Confederation in 1867.

description.zh-cn: 新不伦瑞克省是1867年组成加拿大联邦的三个英属北美殖民地之一，成为创始省份。
description.en: New Brunswick was one of the three British North American colonies that formed the Canadian Confederation in 1867, becoming a founding province.

description.zh-cn: 新斯科舍省是1867年组成加拿大联邦的三个英属北美殖民地之一，成为创始省份。
description.en: Nova Scotia was one of the three British North American colonies that formed the Canadian Confederation in 1867, becoming a founding province.

description.zh-cn: 《1931年西敏法规》肯定了加拿大的独立性，使其成为独立国家。
description.en: The Statute of Westminster 1931 affirmed Canada's independence, establishing it as an independent nation.

description.zh-cn: 在1982年宪法本国化之前，加拿大在立法上受英国国会管辖，英国君主为国家元首。
description.en: Before the patriation of the constitution in 1982, Canada was subject to the legislative authority of the British Parliament, with the British monarch as head of state.

description.zh-cn: 时任加拿大女王伊丽莎白二世御准了《1982年加拿大法令》，将加拿大宪法修宪权移交加拿大国会。
description.en: The then Queen of Canada, Elizabeth II, gave Royal Assent to the Canada Act 1982, transferring the power to amend the Canadian Constitution to the Parliament of Canada.

description.zh-cn: 《1982年加拿大法令》的通过是加拿大宪法本国化过程中的关键一步，正式将修宪权移交加拿大。
description.en: The passage of the Canada Act 1982 was a key step in the process of patriation, formally transferring amending power to Canada.

description.zh-cn: 七年战争结束后，法国将其在北美洲的殖民地新法兰西让予英国，结束了法国的统治。
description.en: After the Seven Years' War, France ceded its North American colony of New France to Great Britain, ending French rule.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次世界大战期间，加拿大对纳粹德国宣战，并作为同盟国一方参与了战争。
description.en: During World War II, Canada declared war on Nazi Germany and participated in the war as one of the Allied powers.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大拒绝了美国提出的出兵伊拉克战争的邀请，未参与该次军事行动。
description.en: Canada declined the United States' invitation to send troops to the Iraq War and did not participate in the military operation.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大与美国有着世界上最长的不设防边境，在军事和经济上有着广泛的合作，并且互为对方最大的贸易伙伴。
description.en: Canada and the United States share the world's longest undefended border, have extensive military and economic cooperation, and are each other's largest trading partners.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大是北大西洋公约组织的创始成员国之一。
description.en: Canada is one of the founding members of the North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO).

description.zh-cn: 加拿大是联合国的创始成员国之一。
description.en: Canada is one of the founding members of the United Nations.

description.zh-cn: 作为前英国殖民地，加拿大是英联邦的成员国。
description.en: As a former British colony, Canada is a member of the Commonwealth of Nations.

relationships.target: 法语国家及地区国际组织

description.zh-cn: 由于其双语传统，加拿大是法语国家及地区国际组织的成员国。
description.en: Due to its bilingual heritage, Canada is a member of the Organisation internationale de la Francophonie.

description.zh-cn: 《北美自由贸易协议》旨在消除加拿大、美国和墨西哥之间的关税，促进了加拿大的对外贸易。
description.en: The North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) aimed to eliminate tariffs between Canada, the United States, and Mexico, thereby promoting Canada's foreign trade.

description.zh-cn: 《北美自由贸易协议》旨在消除加拿大、美国和墨西哥之间的关税，促进了美国的对外贸易。
description.en: The North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) aimed to eliminate tariffs between Canada, the United States, and Mexico, thereby promoting US foreign trade.

description.zh-cn: 《北美自由贸易协议》旨在消除加拿大、美国和墨西哥之间的关税，促进了墨西哥的对外贸易。
description.en: The North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) aimed to eliminate tariffs between Canada, the United States, and Mexico, thereby promoting Mexico's foreign trade.
